title: 820-2850 dead after water damage.
message:
Hi,
the board came to me after cleaning and repair try. 
Fan work for a 2-3 sec.
PPBUS_3GH - 12.3V
PPVIN_G3H_P5VG3S - 12.3V
PPDCIN_G3H - 12.3V
PP5V_G3S- EVERY 5 SECOUND SHOW 5V FOR A SECOUND then 0v
P5VG3S_EN - EVERY 5 SECOUND SHOW 1V-3.4V FOR A SECOUND.
PP3V3_G3H- 3.4V
PP5V_S4SW -0V
PP5V_S5_LDO - 2.4V STABLE BUT EVERY 5 SECOUND SHOW 5V FOR A SECOUND.

title: 820-2850 dead after water damage.
message:
You MUST maintain power button pressed 5-10s, after charger was connected.
Do not release the button faster.

"explain please"
All pages 68-78...

title: 820-2850 dead after water damage.

"PP0V8 - short"
Do you mean PP0V8_SLPS2R?
Bad news then.
Remove C7905, C4423 and check again.
If still short, then bad T2 chip.
